job.title: Cellular System Engineer
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brIn this role you will be at the center of a silicon design group responsible for designing and productizing state of the art cellular SoCs As a cellular system engineer you will be responsible for architecture simulation bringup and validation of endtoend cellular systemsbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brExperience in design and bringup of wireless communication systems with experience in cellular systems preferred brbrGood understanding of communication theory and signal processing AGC beamforming Tx power control mitigation of radio impairments calibration algorithms brbrStrong technical background in 5GNRLTEUMTS 3G2G physical layer and protocols is a plusbrbrExperience with silicon prototyping emulation systems and virtual platforms a plusbrbrHands on experience in bring up of real silicon in lab ability to efficiently use lab equipment such as spectrum analyzer signal generator power meter etcbrbrGood experience with Matlab Python and CC and efficient analysis and automation scriptingbrbrStrong working knowledge of multiple 4G5G signaling and physical layer test equipment KeysightAnritsuRampS along with their automation interfaces is a plusbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong br	Understanding and mapping of systems algorithms and requirements to HWFW architecturebrbr	Simulation based validation of the control flows and algorithmsbrbr	Implement fixedpoint models and perform detailed performance investigation to allow performance signoff and enable RTL bitexact developmentbrbr	Presilicon prototyping and emulation based bringup and validation of the cellular systembrbr	Bringup of the cellular endtoend system including characterization and optimization of performance in the labbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brMS or PhD with 5 Years  Experiencebrbr brRole Number 200204958brbr
